verbose_text: Additionally, SOCS3 can inhibit PI3K / AKT phosphorylation in insulin signaling pathway to reduce hepatic insulin sensitivity XREF_BIBR, consequently suppressing forkhead transcription factor 1 (FoxO1) phosphorylation and promoting hepatic glucose production via increasing transcription of gluconeogenic enzymes XREF_BIBR.
evidence: PI3K/AKT phosphorylation in insulin signaling pathway to reduce hepatic insulin
